API Documentation
NVIC_SCU001 App
void NVIC_SCU001_Init (void)
 Function to initialize the SCU Event Masks based on user configuration.
void NVIC_SCU001_RegisterCallback (NVIC_SCU001_InterruptType IntID, NVIC_SCU001_CallbackType userFunction, uint32_t CbArgs)
 Function to register event handler functions for a specific SCU Event. The user registers the callback function and if the event is unmasked,the Interrupt handler will service the Event as well as clear the Event Status Bit.

Function Documentation

void NVIC_SCU001_Init ( void  )

Function to initialize the SCU Event Masks based on user configuration.

Parameters:
[in]None
Returns:
None

Reentrant: NO
Sync/Async: Synchronous 

  #include <DAVE3.h>

  int main(void)
  {
    DAVE_Init(); // NVIC_SCU001_Init() is called within DAVE_Init()
    // .....
    return 0;
  }


void NVIC_SCU001_RegisterCallback ( NVIC_SCU001_InterruptType  IntID,
NVIC_SCU001_CallbackType  userFunction,
uint32_t  CbArgs 
)

Function to register event handler functions for a specific SCU Event. The user registers the callback function and if the event is unmasked,the Interrupt handler will service the Event as well as clear the Event Status Bit.

Service ID: 0x02

Parameters:
[in]InterruptID
[in]Userdefined Event Handler
[in]CallbackFunction argument if any.
Returns:
None

Reentrant: NO
Sync/Async: Synchronous 

  #include <DAVE3.h>

  void CbListener(uint32_t CbArg)
  {// Callback function implementation
  };
  int main(void)
  {
    DAVE_Init(); // NVIC_SCU001_Init() is called within DAVE_Init()
    // Example usage of API
    NVIC_SCU001_RegisterCallback(NVIC_SCU001_AI,CbListener,0);
    // .....
    return 0;
  }
